sentences.en: Attention: this redirect reduces the fallfactor, but increases the potential force on the belay anchors.
sentences.cn: 注意: 这个变向保护点减小了冲坠系数, 但增加了确保锚点的潜在冲击力.

sentences.en: Body belay - Belay technique using friction of the rope layer's body to slow and hold a fall.
sentences.cn: 利用绳子与保护者身体之间的摩擦来减慢并阻止冲坠的保护技巧.

sentences.en: Hanging belay - To belay facing the wall while suspended by your harness anchors.
sentences.cn: 通过安全带把自己挂在保护点上,面向岩壁做保护.
我们的响导把我们系在绳子的一端.

sentences.en: The props kayaks, bungee cords, belay ropes are seen as a diversion rather a teaching tool.
sentences.cn: 小艇道具 、 高空绳索 、 确保绳索等被视为是种消遣娱乐,而不是种教具.

sentences.en: When you reach a belay station, unzip the pit vents and let off some steam.
sentences.cn: 当您达到系绳站, 解压缩维修喷口和放一些蒸汽.

sentences.en: Your guide hand is placed above the belay device friction brake.
sentences.cn: 您的导向手应放在绳栓摩擦制动装备上面.

trans.tran_en: to make someone who is climbing a mountain etc safe by attaching a rope to them and to a rock
